UTME  
(i) ELUON requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at not more than 
two (2) sittings.  
  
  
CHAPTER THREE  
  
3.0.00 LIST OF POLYTECHNICS AND MONOTECHNICS IN NIGERIA  
    
 Listed in this Chapter are the Polytechnics and Monotechnics in Nigeria and obtainable Programmes. Candidates are strongly advised to carefully study the requirements set out in this 
Chapter of this Brochure before selecting any of the Programmes.
